content.question: The image most clearly represents which of the following trends of the interwar period?

choices.label: Growing communist sympathy in western Europe
Increased United States influence on European affairs
Growing discontent with colonial European rule

topic.text: 8.11: Continuity and Changes in an Age of Global Conflict

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Identify and describe a historical context for a specific historical development or process.
